techmeme.title: In a UK compliance statement, Apple revealed that the iPhone 15 Pro Max will receive security updates for a minimum of five years from September 2023 (Mishaal Rahman/Android Authority)
Stability AI releases Stable Audio Open, a text-to-audio model that generates up to 47 seconds of samples and sound effects, prohibited for commercial use (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
YouTube plans to restrict some content pertaining to the real use of guns from viewers under 18 starting on June 18, a year after a watchdog group report (Will Shanklin/Engadget)
Paxos International, a UAE-based affiliate of Paxos, launches Lift Dollar, or USDL, a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar that will pay a ~5% yield to holders (Ryan Weeks/Bloomberg)
Humane tells Ai Pin owners that they should "immediately" stop using the charging case, citing issues with a battery cell that "may pose a fire safety risk" (Wes Davis/The Verge)
